response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is worth more than just its monetary value. This product holds immense significance and has the potential to greatly enhance your life or business. Given its true worth, I am offering it to you for a special consideration of $950,000.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, do not hesitate to reach out. I am confident that this investment will prove to be highly beneficial for you.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
